article.h1: When a clearance application has been dealt with: storing clearance documents

div.p: The Leicester Non-statutory Clearance Team Link: mailto:nonstatutoryclearanceteam.hmrc@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk keeps copies of all clearances that they have been involved with, together with copies of closure stencils.
Large Business (LB) and specialist units should maintain a complete archive/record of the clearance application in the appropriate file or folder.
Direct tax caseworkers in non-LB compliance teams should follow local practice in determining how clearance documentation should be retained in their office.
For the VAT Clearance Team, and for a VAT registered trader, the clearance documentation should be forwarded through EF to the trader’s folder.
